content: Who composed the music for the iconic Star Wars film series, creating one of the most recognizable theme songs in cinematic history?

The music for the Star Wars film series was composed by the legendary American composer John Williams. His iconic score has become synonymous with the franchise and is widely regarded as one of the greatest film soundtracks of all time. The main theme, in particular, is instantly recognizable and has been celebrated for its ability to capture the epic scope and adventurous spirit of the Star Wars universe.
